entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog in onshore winds. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog in onshore winds this evening and after midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023
